name: Half-life 2D (demo)
description:
Hello!

I created this short demo for the Game Jam 2017. (theme - throwback)

This is the first game I created. The biggest challenge for me was time management and creating sprites. Maybe 80% of my time went into animating and drawing. I've learned that it's more important to have an ugly so-so completed game, than having only two (but pretty) levels
